card.name: Alexandrite Dragon
card.description: Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery, along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not.

card.name: Spirit of the Harp
card.description: A spirit that soothes the soul with the music of its heavenly harp.

card.name: Frostosaurus
card.description: This monster's metabolism enables it to endure long periods of cold, harnessing the power to become a creature of solid ice! Nothing else can withstand such temperatures, especially victims of its glacial rampage.

card.name: Zubaba Knight
card.description: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a face-up Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster.

card.name: Ganbara Knight
card.description: When this face-up Attack Position card is targeted for an attack: You can change it to Defense Position.

card.name: Gogogo Golem
card.description: Once per turn, this Defense Position card cannot be destroyed by battle.

card.name: Gogogo Giant
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 "Gogogo" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in face-up Defense Position, then change this card to Defense Position. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase.

card.name: Goblindbergh
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand, also, after that, change this card to Defense Position.

card.name: Feedback Warrior
card.description: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster you control; it becomes Level 3.

card.name: Shine Knight
card.description: This card is Level 4 while in face-up Defense Position.

card.name: Cyber Dragon
card.description: If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

card.name: Trident Warrior
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 monster from your hand.

card.name: Chiron the Mage
card.description: Once per turn: You can discard 1 Spell Card, then target 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card.name: Marauding Captain
card.description: Your opponent cannot target Warrior monsters for attacks, except this one. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand.

card.name: Penguin Soldier
card.description: FLIP: You can target up to 2 monsters on the field; return those targets to the hand.

card.name: Sangan
card.description: If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Sangan" once per turn.

card.name: Giant Rat
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 EARTH monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in Attack Position.

card.name: Shining Angel
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 LIGHT monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

card.name: Blustering Winds
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK and DEF until your next Standby Phase.

card.name: Ego Boost
card.description: When a monster declares an attack: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 1000 ATK until the end of the Battle Phase.

card.name: Xyz Energy
card.description: Detach 1 Xyz Material you control to target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card.name: Star Changer
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field and activate 1 of these effects;● Increase that target's Level by 1.● Reduce that target's Level by 1.

card.name: Swords of Revealing Light
card.description: After this card's activation, it remains on the field, but you must destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monster, flip all monsters they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent's monsters cannot declare an attack.

card.name: Mystical Space Typhoon
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

card.name: Fissure
card.description: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the lowest ATK (your choice, if tied).

card.name: Gravity Axe - Grarl
card.description: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. Monsters your opponent controls cannot change their battle positions.

card.name: Reinforcement of the Army
card.description: Add 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior monster from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: Burden of the Mighty
card.description: Each face-up monster your opponent controls loses 100 ATK x its own Level.

card.name: Heartfelt Appeal
card.description: When you take battle damage from your opponent's direct attack: Take control of the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls with the highest DEF, until your next End Phase. (If it's a tie, you get to choose.) Its effects are negated, also it cannot declare an attack.

card.name: Xyz Effect
card.description: When you Xyz Summon a monster: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

card.name: Raigeki Break
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

card.name: Trap Hole
card.description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

card.name: Dust Tornado
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.

card.name: Magic Cylinder
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

card.name: Draining Shield
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate that attack, and if you do, gain LP equal to that target's ATK.

card.name: Call of the Haunted
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that target. When that target is destroyed, destroy this card.

card.name: Limit Reverse
card.description: Target 1 monster with 1000 or less ATK in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in Attack Position. If the target is changed to Defense Position, destroy it and this card. When this card leaves the field, destroy the target. When the target is destroyed, destroy this card.

card.name: Seven Tools of the Bandit
card.description: When a Trap Card is activated: Pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

card.name: Number 39: Utopia
card.description: 2 Level 4 monstersWhen a monster declares an attack: You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the attack. If this card is targeted for an attack, while it has no material: Destroy this card.

card.name: Muzurhythm the String Djinn
card.description: 2 Level 3 monstersWhen a "Djinn" Xyz Monster you control is attacking an opponent's monster, during the Damage Step: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; the attacking monster's ATK is doubled until the End Phase. You can only use this effect of "Muzurhythm the String Djinn" once per turn.

card.name: Temtempo the Percussion Djinn
card.description: 2 Level 3 monstersOnce per turn, during either player's turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target 1 face-up Xyz Monster your opponent controls; detach 1 Xyz Material from that monster, and if you do, all "Djinn" Xyz Monsters you currently control gain 500 ATK.

card.name: Melomelody the Brass Djinn
card.description: 2 Level 3 monstersOnce per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target 1 "Djinn" Xyz Monster you control; it can make a second attack during each Battle Phase this turn.

card.name: Maestroke the Symphony Djinn
card.description: 2 Level 4 monstersOnce per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target 1 face-up Attack Position monster your opponent controls; change it to face-down Defense Position. If a "Djinn" Xyz Monster you control would be destroyed, you can detach 1 Xyz Material from that monster instead.
